name: Gramin Vikas Sansthan
briefDescription: Grameen Vikas Sansthan- is a civil society organization established in 1989-90 by a group of social activist after brainstorming and need assessment of the eastern up district where the community people were deprived from all type of development indicators. The organization is working on Empowering the community through people participation by developing community based organization (CBOs) of women the major beneficiaries as well as the agent of social change, to cover the  Women and children from deprived community through Women empowerment, Health(maternal health, Literacy, and livelihood. Presently organization is working in three district of eastern UP (Mau, Deoria and Ghazipur) on the issue of Gender and Sexuality, HIV/AIDS ,literacy.
